name: TrollJump
description:
*WE DO NOT RECOMMEND YOU PLAY IN FULL SCREEN*

The game is based on a space robot that likes to do parkour around.  

- To control the robot use: W,A,S,D. 

- To jump use the key: Space 

- Box PowerUp: the mysterious boxes are used to recover already destroyed blocks, causing the map to restore itself, giving more platform space for the player. 

The objective of the game is to last as long as possible on the platform and get the highest score possible. As time goes by the map will self-destruct. Use the mysterious box to reverse this situation.

LEADERBOARD POWERED BY LOOTLOCKER

Sérgio Faheina (sergiofah): Code and final Unity looks.

Pedro Henrique (pedroHQ): 3D Modeling

Rodrigo (Snest): 2D & UI Design

Tiago (Sorriso): Music
